title: Learner-Centered Project-Based Course for Research and Development of Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and general understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Short intensive course focused on enhancing competencies in utilizing MOOCs and PLEs for corporate language education innovation by current practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze MOOC design frameworks to suggest corporate-tailored language course development plans
Design and execute learner-driven language learning projects using PLE (Personal Learning Environment) tools
Propose improvement directions for MOOC language courses based on formative assessment data

resources: PLE (Personal Learning Environment) Tool Trial Account

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
